site_name: Deer Park SchoolParkshotRichmondTW9 2RE
description: Retention of two two storey modular units and two single storey modular units in association with the continued use of the site for non residential institution use (Class D1), for a temporary period until 31st August 2021
decision_conditions: The Council wishes to make no comments on this application.

Condition 24 (Pedestrian Environment Review Study) -The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Condition 24 of planning permission 19/01228/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
Confirmation of the description ''Proposed development as set within phase 1, demolition of derelict sports pavilion building, scope of works document would constitute a material operation.''
